122.content:
When it dawns on the girl that you weren’t a large bug, but in fact a very small boy, she shrieks and almost falls out of her seat.

“What are you?" she asks in astonishment.

"My sister goes to this school, I was just dropping her off and I shrank, I don't know what happened, please you have to help me..." you start rambling.

“My name is Rachel,” she says, “what’s yours?”

“I’m James,” you tell her.

Now that you can finally relax a little, you walk to the edge of the desk to take in your surroundings. Judging by the decorations on the wall, this was probably a classroom for some of the younger students. You suddenly get an uneasy feeling in your stomach.

"What grade is this?" you ask Rachel.

"Second grade," Rachel informs you. "Why?"

"Oh, no reason," you say, trying to sound nonchalant, but your suspicions have been confirmed: this was your evil next door neighbor Bailey's class. You've seen what insane kinky things Bailey does to creatures your size from your bedroom window. You shudder with your whole body.

You had a choice to make: you could stay with Rachel and risk being discovered by Bailey, or you could look for help somewhere else and risk being squished (or worse) by some other kid.

Which do you choose?

You eventually learn that you aren’t the only victim of the shrinking phenomenon, which nobody can really explain. You also learn that it’ll wear off in a few weeks’ time.
